wikipedia_page.main:
Richard N Newman (dates unknown) was an English cricketer and match organiser who played batsman for Essex, Kent and All-England from the 1773 season to 1793. Richards first-class debut came on 21 June 1773. He was a leading amateur player and an early member of MCC. Newman scored the first ever half century at Lord's, while batting for Essex.
He made 22 known first-class appearances. His final game came on 19 August 1793,in a match organised by himself between RN Newman's XI and R Leigh's XI.

response: *Colonel Richard Newman (c. 1620 - 1695), English barrister and Royalist officer during the English Civil War
*Sir Richard Newman, 1st Baronet (c. 1675-1721), English MP for Milborne Port in 1701
*Richard Newman (broadcaster) (born 1972), British-Canadian writer and broadcaster, former Big Brother UK contestant
